awardsHtml:
54 wins & 208 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2020 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series
Jeffrey Wright (For playing: "Bernard".)
2020 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series
Thandiwe Newton (For playing: "Maeve".)
2020 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Fantasy/Sci-Fi Costumes
Shay Cunliffe (costume designer) - Dan Bronson (costume supervisor) - Amanda Riley (assistant costume designer) - Jo Kissack (associate costume designer) - Giorgia Tramontano (assistant costume designer) (For Parce Domine (2020))
2020 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Prosthetic Makeup for a Series, Limited Series, Movie or Special
Justin Raleigh (special makeup effects department head) - Chris Hampton (special makeup effects artist) - Thomas Floutz (special makeup effects artist) (For Crisis Theory (2020))
2020 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Special Visual Effects
Jay Worth (vfx supervisor) - Martin Hernblad (vfx supervisor) - Jeremy Fernsler (vfx supervisor) - Nhat Phong Tran (vfx supervisor) - Joe Wehmeyer (on set vfx supervisor) - Bruce Branit (on set vfx supervisor) - Octevia Robertson (vfx coordinator) - Jacqueline VandenBussche (vfx production manager) - Mark R. Byers (spfx supervisor) (For Crisis Theory (2020))
